name: Log Runner & Log Caster
description:
Play as fox or as a beaver with a friend in this multiplayer co-op arcade game !

  • As the fox, jump on different wood logs to cross the river and steal the cake in order to bring it to your family !
  • As the beaver, swim in the river and take logs of wood to solidify your dam

This game was made in less than a day for the Advent Calendar challenge in LUDUS Académie the theme was "Piquer une belle bûche", which in French means "fall down" but also "Steal a pretty log" litterally.

How to play
  • As the fox
    • Use the arrow keys to jump in any direction
    • While jumping, press the same key to do a double jump in the same direction
    • Go grab the cake and bring it to the sleeping fox !
  • As the beaver
    • Use Z (up), Q (left), S (down) and D (right) to start swimming in any direction
    • Go grab some wood and bring it to the dam ! But try not to take the logs the fox is trying to jump on !
Credits
  • Game Design and Programming : Gaëtan Piou
  • Art :
    • Logs of wood by Gaëtan Piou
    • 2D Pixel Art Fox Sprite by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop
    • Otter Sprite Pack by RiLi_XL
    • Adventure TileSet (Forest) by saintjacky
    • Ground Seamless unrepetitive textures by Dandruff
    • Free Cake Pack by Xanthius
